de.thkoeln.bibl.api.lms.slnp.transfer

Class Request

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.thkoeln.bibl.api.lms.slnp.transfer.Transfer<RequestMessage>
      • de.thkoeln.bibl.api.lms.slnp.transfer.Request
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LoginRequest, MediaSearchRequest

    public class Request
extends Transfer<RequestMessage>
    Implements a generic SLNP request. A Request can be used to request data from the SLNP server. It uses messages of type RequestMessage to communicate with the SLNP server.
    Author:
    Patrick Rogalla

      Initialize a new Request with an object that implements the Connectable interface.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Request

        public Request(Connectable con,
               java.lang.String cmd)
        throws MessageFormatException
        Initialize a new Request with an object that implements the Connectable interface. The Request don't use a protocol level authentication at the SLNP server. The supplied command describes the SLNP command used for this request.
        Parameters:
        con - a reference to a Connectable object. This reference will be used to communicate with the server
        cmd - the command used for this request
        Throws:
        MessageFormatException - if the supplied command has an invalid format

      • Request

        public Request(Connectable con,
               java.lang.String cmd,
               Credentials cred)
        throws MessageFormatException
        Initialize a new Request with an object that implements the Connectable interface. The Request uses the supplied credentials to do a protocol level authentication at the SLNP server. The supplied command describes the SLNP command used for this request.
        Parameters:
        con - a reference to a Connectable object. This reference will be used to communicate with the server
        cmd - the command used for this request
        cred - credentials used for a protocol level authentication
        Throws:
        MessageFormatException - if the supplied command has an invalid format

    • Method Detail

      • addParameter

        public void addParameter(java.lang.String key,
                         java.lang.String value)
                  throws MessageFormatException
        Adds a new parameter to the request. The method transparently creates a RequestMessage from the supplied key and value.
        Parameters:
        key - the key used for creating the message
        value - the value used for creating the message
        Throws:
        MessageFormatException - if the created message has a invalid format

      • addParameter

        public void addParameter(java.lang.String key,
                         int value)
                  throws MessageFormatException
        Adds a new parameter to the request. The method transparently creates a RequestMessage from the supplied key and value.
        Parameters:
        key - the key used for creating the message
        value - the value used for creating the message
        Throws:
        MessageFormatException - if the created message has a invalid format

      • send

        public void send(Connectable con)
        Sends the request to the SLNP server using the supplied connection.
        Parameters:
        con - a reference to a Connectable object. This reference will be used to communicate with the server

      • send

        public void send()
        Sends the request to the SLNP server.
